skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: As soon as you put the moisturizer on your skin it’s so smooth. It’s a gel consistency, which I love. It doesn’t long to dry so you don’t have to wait a long time to put your makeup on. I have oily skin in the summer and I get some dry patches in the winter. It doesn’t take much to cover your entire face. The jar will last a long time. I have used samples of it before a while ago. I just got a complimentary full size to review from Influenster.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_title: Completely New Retinol Experience - GREAT FOR ACNE
review_description: If you've tried any other Retinol products, this will be a radically different experience. The previous retinol products I have tried have made my skin extremely dry. This is surprisingly VERY moisturizing. Its so moisturizing I actually use it alone. I have only used it for 2 weeks and my skin is the best its ever been. My skin is very acne prone and this has changed my life. I haven't had ANY new breakouts while using this. Side note, I was very apprehensive about their claim you can use this alongside their TLC serum but I can say I have tried it and my face didn't fall off! However I much prefer it alone. This product is definitely a win.

skincare_concerns: Dryness and Redness
what_it_is: A cooling and soothing moisturizing gel for face and body that calms and hydrates your skin post-sun or post-workout.
review_description: This is a wonderful product! I picked up a bottle on our vacation, and the entire family used it - it's soothing, highly moisturizing, and smells great. Even those of us with very sensitive skin had no problems.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I incorporated this HA into my routine a month ago and it is now a permanent addition my routine. It is a must-have product for those concerned with hydration and anti-aging. I have dry to combination skin. I use this product in the AM and follow use with a daily moisturizer. It provides my skin with a nice bounce and works well under makeup. It has a thick, gel-like consistency and you should let it sink in before applying the next step of your routine or makeup. I love The Ordinary and I am excited to see it at Sephora!

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: Spray and go. This feels so silky and lux. Initially I bought this for myself but my husband loved this product a lot that I'm getting him his own. He works on high rise building (construction) and says it works on all day.

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: I'm fair skinned and I went to the beach for about four hours not realizing until later that I had turned red and was rather burnt.  The kind of burnt that you know is going to hurt for the next few days.  I slathered this on before I went to bed and twice throughout the night and the next few days afterwards.  I didn't peel and my skin tanned nicely. The key is to keep using it.  I noticed that once I tanned and stopped, I should have kept at it for a few more days because I did have some light peeling, but that was my fault. I loved this product so much I bought two more just in case I stay in the sun too long. Highly recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: I'm a influenster product reviewer and was given this product to try and give my honest review. I tried the JLo Limitless glow multitasking mask and I love it. First let me start with the mask itself it comes in two pieces to make sure that every part of your face is covered. The  First thing I noticed was the cooling than a few minutes later the warm effect the mask provides.  I wore it for about 25 min than I removed the mask. My skin felt refreshed and hydrated like a new woman!! I must have more of them

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: An overnight eye cream formulated to visibly smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, firm the look of skin, and actively hydrate while you sleep.
review_description: I love this eye cream! It's super hydrating and I like the idea of protecting and taking care of my under-eye skin while I'm sleeping. I've used this for about a week now and have noticed my under-eye skin is more moisturized. This is a good, affordable solution.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dark Circles.
what_it_is: A rich eye cream, powered by a breakthrough blend of peptides and silk tree extract to visibly firm, brighten, and fight fine lines for younger-looking eyes.
review_description: I really love this product. I tried it for 14 days because of puffy and dark under eyes. After my 14 days I was pleasantly surprised to see an improvement in my skin under my eyes. The darkness, had drastically faded and the puffiness had gone to a minimum. After I have used all of my sample, I’ll definitely be purchasing this! This is an amazing product!

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: A hydrating eye cream that rapidly reduces the appearance of dark circles, smooths the look of lines and wrinkles, and prevents further damage in 21 days.
review_title: Good eye cream, but not worth the price
review_description: I've used this product on and off for a few years. I love the texture and it does a fabulous job at moisturizing around my eyes. However, it's honestly not worth it to spend a lot of money on an eye cream - it's really just an overpriced moisturizer in a smaller tub. Skin care brands market the need for a different moisturizer for your eye area, but in truth you can really put any old moisturizer there fine. So while I definitely enjoy this, I have a hard time recommending an eye cream at this price point to anybody. If you've got the money to burn and enjoy the experience - well this is one of the nicest textured eye creams I've ever used. Otherwise I'd leave it.

what_it_is: A lightweight, refreshing eye cream that smooths fine lines with a 26-hour burst of moisture, boosts elasticity, and increases the resilience of the skin for flawless makeup application.
review_description: I’m not one to usually use eye balms but I was kindly gifted this one and instantly fell in love. I thought it was the perfect consistency and not too heavy/uncomfortable under my eye!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: I got this from a friend who had purchased it but didn’t really like it. I have been using it this winter and it works ok. I have pretty normal skin, tends toward sensitive and can get oily when it heats up. For me, I have to apply another moisturizer on top of it. I think if you have oily skin this would be great as you would not need anything else. But for dryer skin probably not the best.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description: To start: I am a huuuuuge and extremely loyal fan of the microdelivery peel by philosophy. When I got these as a sample, I wasn't very excited because I was under the impression that I already had the best peel system and didn't need another. But I decided to give them a go one day and W O W they are amazing. I'd say that they are either on par with or better than the microdelivery peel! I'm going to keep using philosophy because it is slightly more economical - but if money is no object, BUY THESE. Docked one star for the price because as I explained, there are other products that yield similar results for cheaper.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: I can always count on this oil work magic on my face. I am usually really sensitive and acne prone, but with this product I've seen such a remarkable difference. If I could give it a million stars I would. Highly recommend.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration for a healthy glow and acts as a cooling and refreshing "drink of water" for dull, dry skin.
review_description: This is weird because the sample I got lasted me so long and this has lasted me like 6 weeks.. I don't know if someone is using it without asking or I am just using much more... sorry if thats not helpful. The sample changed my skin one hundred percent. All of my acne went down and oiliness turned into baby soft skin. I have hormonal breakouts that just get fed with the summer heat... gross I know, but this calmed it down. I also started using a dermatologist prescribed spot treatment so that is drying my skin out, possibly why I'm using much more now than with the sample. A little did go a long way so it must be personal thing. Overall if you are prone to breaking out and oiliness, go for it. Also had a sun burn and it really soothed it.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: This product does what it is marketed to do. I have switched over from Sunday Riley to drunk elephant and I am in love.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: I tried this amazing Shani Darden Skin Care Retinol Reform for 2 weeks,  and noticed amazing results.  It brightened my skin,  and i started noticing wrinkles diminishing around my eyes.  This stuff is the best stuff i've ever used so far. Definitely will be purchasing more of this product when its gone!

what_it_is: An effervescent bath bomb for relaxation and recovery with epsom salt, moisturizing oils, and broad-spectrum hemp extract with naturally occurring CBD.
review_description: Oh wow. This is hands down the best bath soak I’ve ever used throughout my lifelong love of baths. The smell is amazing, it is so moisturizing and left my skin feeling extra pampered but not sticky (could get into bed 30 min later without feeling like I’m ruining the sheets). The recovery aspect is the real hero - I’d been fighting back pain for a few days and this is so soothing and loosening on my muscles. Can’t wait to buy more. The ultimate treat.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A detoxifying bath soak infused with 240 mg of CBD&#151 for whenever you’re sore from a workout, need to soothe an overworked body, or deserve an indulgent night of self-care.
review_description: These are one of the best bath salts I’ve ever tried, the relaxing experience in creates for a bath is totally worth it. The aroma therapy alone is amazing, and the muscle relaxing is just a major plus.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Pores, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: An antioxidant packed serum with 500 mg of full-spectrum CBD plus 20 potent botanicals that help to deeply hydrate, detoxify pores, and boost skin's natural glow.
review_title: If you want a J-Lo glow, this will give it to you!
review_description: First, the texture seems more like an oil than your traditional serum so if you're partial to one or the other, just be aware.  However, this stuff is AMAZING!  I got a sample as an online promo

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A super-powered face oil made from just two ingredients (1000mg of CBD and Grapeseed Oil) designed to provide extreme moisturization and reset the appearance of stressed skin.
review_description: Love it! Definitely a face oil I will be reordering

what_it_is: A luxurious and indulgent bath soak with skin-softening organic coconut milk as its base, that is perfect for hydrating and softening skin.
review_description: if you love coconut you will adore this, I definitely did. the problem is just that you get SO LITTLE for so much money! it is a cute jar, a nice bath soak, but really only viable if youre feeling extra for the sake of being extra

what_it_is: A handcrafted, stone essential oil diffuser that doubles as a stunningly simple piece of home decor.
review_description: Best diffuser I have found yet! Great quality and awesome design. But why does Sephora charge so much? I just bought mine off of the Vitruvi website and saved $60. Either way it's worth the money.

skincare_concerns: Dryness and Redness
what_it_is: A cooling, restorative body lotion loaded with 100mg of CBD to soothe and calm sensitive, stressed out skin.
review_description: The scent is purely awful. Smells very skunky and like burnt weed. Nasty smell. The scent lingers all day and on clothing. You get random nasty whiffs of it all day. Made my skin get hives, so that’s great. Not very moisturizing. I would not recommend at all. Sorry.

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A plant-powered oil that helps calm and relieve fatigued, sensitive skin.
review_description: This oil is definitely worth the price!! I was afraid of using at first because oils are hit or miss with me, I was terrified it would cause a breakout but it completely did the opposite! It has actually helped to clear my skin and reduce redness on my face, I use it before bedtime and a small amount goes a long way so, even though it is pricey, it will last a long time. I don’t know how it would do on oily skin but I have combination to dry skin and it works great without being too oily.

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: Made my skin amazing

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A soothing face oil packed with 100 mg of CBD and adaptogens to visibly calm the look of redness and reset the appearance of stressed skin.
review_description: I love this product.  I have been dealing with mild rosacea on my cheeks for about a year and a half and have tried many products to address it. After using this for two weeks, I can't believe how good my skin looks.  The rosacea is completely healed.  The project also smells great and is easy to apply.  I love it.

what_it_is: A sleep mask made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: Omg I thought I was being a little extra with the silk sleep mask BUT it is sooo worth it. I live in an apartment where the sun comes right through my blinds but hate blackout curtains because it’s too much. I sleep on my face and toss and turn. This doesn’t slip off, the band isn’t too big or pitchy I love this mask and it keeps me asleep all through the night. Can’t say for sure but not having the light helps black out some of the annoying children that scream outside my window every morning. Definitely worth the money and would 100% recommend.

what_it_is: A king-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_title: This pillowcase is amazing! Worth the money.
review_description: This pillowcase really works! I bought  both Caramel and Charcoal. I have long, fine hair and I would always wake with some amount of knots and dryness. No more. My hair is surprisingly no longer dry  when I get up and the knots are gone. I waited to but because I really didn't think it would be worth the cost but it is. Love this.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: Love this!! It feels great on my skin

what_it_is: A bestselling tinted moisturizer with a new and improved formula, infused with skincare benefits for up to 24-hour hydration and SPF 30 sunscreen to protect.
review_description: I honestly couldn’t even tell I was wearing a product. The formula was hydrating and gave me a more dewy complexion, but only mildly evened out my skin tone. I might as well have not been wearing any makeup at all... Personally not worth my time

This is an amazing foundation. I like to have full coverage because I feel like it gives you more of an airbrushed appearance. This foundation gives you flawless looking skin that last all day long. I hate that caked on feeling you get with some foundations, this one is not like that at all. I often forget I even have it on. As I mentioned I like my foundation to look thick so I am currently using this foundation with the NARS powder foundation and it is fabulous! The two combined are amazing I feel like a movie star! But this foundation all by itself still makes you look flawless. I have used so many different foundations clinique, estee lauder, lancome, bare minerals, make up forever, the list goes on..This is by far my favorite!!

I have light skin and light brown hair and I use the cream ivory it matches my skin perfectly!

skincare_concerns: Dullness, Dryness, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A hydrating, makeup-gripping primer with SPF 40 and blue-light protection that has a pearlescent finish to leave skin luminous with a instant glow.
review_description: It’s beautiful on its own if you want your skin to look a little refreshed, but I have been using it under my liquid foundation and I am very happy with how it gives me a little glow and fresh looking skin.

what_it_is: A brightening, vitamin C-rich eye crème that targets signs of aging, reducing the look of dark circles while improving concealer application and wear—inspired by makeup artist secret, banana powder.
review_description: I was really excited when I heard about this new eye cream and the technology incorporated to help improve concelar wear. I do find the cream to help diminish dark circles and give good moisture (thanks to the vitamin c) but one star off as I dont find it helps improve my concealer wear. Great for day use but for night I prefer a retinol based cream.

skincare_concerns: Dark spots, Pores, and Dryness
what_it_is: A refillable two-in-one sunscreen moisturizer that’s lightweight, oil free, noncomedogenic, and invisible—it targets dark spots, and is makeup-friendly.
review_description:
Pros- Love the dewy look I get with this moisturizer and it has SPF without the ugly white cast, which is a plus.  

Con - Fragrance is ST-RONNNNNNGGG! But that's what covers up the smell of the SPF so oh well. I still re-purchased. Just wait for the scent to die off, which happens in about 5-10 mins.

what_it_is: A lightweight, natural-looking tinted moisturizer that supports skin’s overall condition and provides a translucent veil of sun protection.
review_description: Ive been using this tinted moisurizer for about 3 months and I love it. Im not even halfway done with the bottle and I use it pretty much everyday. I use a small drop on 3 fingers on each hand and blend. If u wnt something heavier do it again. This stuff is great. I have oily Tzone and dry cheeks and forehead. It gives a very nice summer glow, not a matte finish for a full face of makeup. Sephora ultra-smoothing primer, Nars concealor and this moisturizer is my daily regimen.

what_it_is: An oil-free, color-correcting, full-coverage foundation with SPF 40 physical mineral sunscreen.
review_description:
I was given this product in order to review it, and I'm extremely happy with it thus far. I have never been too into makeup, so I normally buy drug store makeup for the rare occasion that I do end up wearing some. Considering that I would not normally buy myself a product of this price, it was very easy to see the difference between this product and something that only costs a few dollars. This product had great coverage that matched my skintone and covered up all of the red spots on my face. The color lasted all day long and didn't become an oily mess like most makeup I normally wear would do. The cream comes out with a thick appearance, but once I applied it to my skin the it didn't appear as thick and blended very well.
Overall, this cream is almost like a little bit of luxury for me, and it I ever wanted to splurge for this type of product I would buy this again in a heartbeat.

what_it_is: A cult-favorite all-in-one beauty balm perfects the complexion with a powerful anti-aging complex while shielding skin from UV damage.
review_description: When you need to get out the door FAST this is the way to go. I use one pump divided between forehead and neck and one pump for the rest of my face. Don't be alarmed by the ugly gray color - within 2 minutes the gray is gone and you are left with a natural even skin tone. This one is rather matte - no sparkle or shimmer at all, but it leaves a believable result. I still need to use concealer for my zombie-like under eye circles. My typical everyday face is Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer, but this BB cream is my new fave. Big results for little effort, and love the sunscreen factor.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dark Circles
what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing under-eye cream powered by patented peptides to help reduce the look of dark circles and fine lines and wrinkles.
review_description:
I received this product complimentary, from JLO Beauty and Influenster, in return for honest feedback.

Really moisturizing...the thing I really liked was it didn't burn my eyes. It also didn't make my eyes look oily after having it on for a few hours. It's a thicker cream than I'm accustomed to but overall a solid product othe packing is beautiful!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines, Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: A powerful, newly reformulated, anti-wrinkle eye cream that reveals visible results in as little as one week.
review_description: A little goes a long way with this product. Just dabbing the tiniest bit under my eyes has made such a big difference in my under eye area.

skincare_concerns: Puffiness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: A hydrating and lightweight under-eye cream that helps to reduce the appearance of puffiness, under-eye bags, and fine lines.
review_description: It’s fine I guess, but there is very little hydration. The only reason to use an eye cream (other than for anti aging reasons) is for hydration.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich and restorative eye cream featuring eight peptides, five forms of vitamin C, and cucumber extract for firmer-, brighter-looking skin.
review_description: I saw noticeable results in such a short period of time.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An eye cream that fights the signs of aging and melts to release a double shield of hydration with liquid silk and moisture-locking Japanese white peony for instantly youthful-looking, radiant eyes.
review_description: So soft. So creamy. So nice. I love this cream. It smells nice, it's not thick under the eyes. Nothing can compare.

what_it_is: A clean, tinted mineral SPF serum that provides light, dewy coverage with active levels of skincare ingredients.
review_description: I’ve been wearing this product for a few weeks now! I’ve never felt anything like this it goes on like a serum but you can’t tell your wearing it! Looks dewy if you wear it alone. Love the SPF everyone needs that! I have noticed my face looks tighter. I tend to break out from makeup this clean beauty product has not caused any breakouts. The scent is light and seems to go away after you put it on.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A totally invisible, weightless, scentless, and makeup-gripping daily primer with SPF 40.
review_title: Love it, dig it, will buy again
review_description: Though spendy, this product is totally worth it. There is no white residue, goes on smooth like a primer, and absorbs well. Wore it on a hike in the snow and didn't get burned at all. Also, I have blemish-prone skin and I didn't break out al all which is major!!!

what_it_is: A color-correcting, full-coverage foundation with SPF 50 physical mineral sunscreen that delivers a flawless, natural finish.
review_description: I love this stuff, but I find it only works if I apply it with a sponge. Using a brush or my fingers resulted in oxidized disaster. But with a sponge, it has a skin-like, slightly dewy finish, perfect for my dry skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling lip balm that hydrates for up to 24 hours and smooths the look of wrinkles for visibly fuller lips.
review_description: I absolutely love this product but I hate the price. I got this and the pink in my Play! boxes and was very excited. Just don’t keep it in your pocket or carry it around on a really hot day because it will melt and then when you go to apply it to your lips you might lose a chunk of it. Oops. Live and learn.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: I had high hopes for this, but it was nothing special. Save your money.

what_it_is: A calming gel face mask with blue tansy, natural BHA, and fruit enzymes (natural AHA) that clarifies skin, helps control shine, and reduces the look of pores.
review_description: didn't see a change, and smells awful...... sad

what_it_is: A hydrating, non-sticky, long-lasting lip gloss that cushions lips all day with soft, nourishing color and shine.
review_description: This is such a wonderful gloss! The shade I got, nearly Berry, is perfect for my darker skin and the gloss feels really balmy rather than sticky. It hydrates my lips well over a lip liner and I’m really enjoying how natural it looks since I’m not doing full makeup looks nowadays.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A lightweight, moisture-coating lip balm for hydrated, tinted, and kissable lips throughout the day.
review_description: So first of all this product is not new. This has been out awhile in Korea. I love all the yummy scents to the glowy lip balm. It does have a nice tint upon application and will fade throughout the day from eating, talking, and drinking. It does leave my lips very hydrated and glossy throughout the day. This is easily comparable to the LANEIGE lip sleeping mask. Now, let’s talk about price point. Is it worth $15?? Absolutely not. I have gotten this cheap elsewhere and that is why it is not getting 5 stars.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: Two limited-edition lip masks in chocolate mint and lemon sorbet to lock in moisture overnight.
review_description: I love the mint flavour. It’s my favourite. But the mask together doesn’t do much to my lips. Although it feels nice and silky the minute I put it on, the morning after I don’t see a difference. Almost like a super thick chapstick

what_it_is: A nurturing, glossy lip oil that protects and enhances the lips, bringing out their natural color.
review_description: I love this on my lips it feel really nourishing, but i feel like a i have to reapply often since it wears off quickly.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A silky vegan lip mask that hydrates and soothes parched lips while sealing in moisture for lusher-than-life lips on demand day or night.
review_description: I Love the Summer Friday products but wasn't crazy about this one! The packaging for the lip balm needs to be reconfigured. Too much comes out when you squeeze it out and then you waste the product.

what_it_is: An ultra-hydrating leave-on mask that wraps your lips with active levels of skin-soothing ingredients, leaving them feeling soft, supple, and revived.
review_description: I really was excited about this item and it did not disappoint. It's an easy application and keeps my lips soft and moisturized. I will say I do have to reapply this more often than aquaphor which is what I usually use and also why I can't give it 5 stars. Not as long lasting as I'd like.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A soothing, non-sticky jelly lip mask of Japanese peach and olive-derived squalane that softens, smooths, and helps restore for visibly plump lips.
review_description: Really wanted to love it but it was just an unfortunate experience. The one star is for the cute packaging and beautiful colour of the product itself. The actual lip mask however dried out my lips.

what_it_is: An overnight, moisture-recharging gel mask that quickly absorbs while you sleep to deeply hydrate skin.
review_description: I'm in love with this moisturizer. I have been using it consistently for almost a year now and my face truly doesn't suffer from the dryness that it did before. Excellent product!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A mask that visibly plumps, hydrates, and nurtures the skin for a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: Holy smokes! I love this mask - the price tag not so much. I’m on accutane at the moment so I’ve been stocking up on hydrating masks and I finally dug this one out. I immediately noticed my skin looked more hydrated, plump, and radiant and that carried over for the next three days. Even my mom commented on my skin, telling me how good it looked! I will definitely be buying this again but it will be a luxury given how much more expensive this is compared to other sheet masks.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A collection of next-generation Sephora Collection facemasks in a new bio-fiber to perfectly hug facial contours for more effective results.
review_description: I love all these masks, but the lychee is my favorite. I love the scent and it makes my skin feel wonderful when I use it.

what_it_is: A line of natural lyocell fiber masks, each with specific skin care benefits.
review_description: I got this mask as a sample and I didn’t care to try it, until of recent, because I saw it was sold for cheap. This is the best mask I’ve ever used. review_title: The BEST exfoliant, but DON'T BE LIKE ME
review_description:
I love this product, which is why I'm giving it the 5 stars it deserves. I'm on my second bottle, but I just wanted to write on here to remind people to use this carefully, as 30% AHA is pretty potent and you could get chemical burns like I did last night bc I did not use it properly.

After waxing my upper/lower lip, I reached for this because it had been a while since I had last used it, and I wanted to shrink my blackheads/pores across my nose/cheeks. However, I should have avoided the areas on my face I had just waxed, bc I got mild chemical burns on the areas of fresh, new skin at the corners of my lips... Nothing that can't be fixed using Aquaphor, Cetaphil cream, and sunscreen, but still, I should have been smarter to avoid the damage. The blackheads/pores on my nose/cheeks are much smaller though, so at least that's a win. 

Just remember that this should be used alone to stay on the safe side. I would also avoid using this in combination with any other active ingredients (Vitamin C, Vitamin A (retinol/retinoids), etc.). I learned my lesson last night, and will remember to avoid using it after exfoliating/facial waxing, too. Hope this helps!

review_description: Package comes with 2 sheets. I gave this an honest try and used an entire sheet (10 dots) over the course of 5 days but saw no difference. Returned the unused ones. Wish it would have worked.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: Great Moisturizer I am so prone to milia, and that you have to have them extracted. Most heavy creams cause me to get these. This cream does not. It went on well, it absorbed well and my skin feels really soft and smooth. I have ordered other products but I'm having to get them directly from the company. I do wish the bottle was bigger.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight broad-spectrum SPF 30 moisturizer formulated with a hydrating blend of hyaluronic acid, natural sugars, and glycerin, designed to visibly plump and protect skin.
review_description: I got this product for free in exchange for a review. The product is thick and the packaging is nice. I don’t like the scent, it smells like an old lady cream. It protects my skin, but the same amount that any sunscreen would.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A luxuriously rich cream that thoroughly soothes, moisturizes, and hydrates to help heal away dryness—the La Mer moisturizer that started it all.
review_description: The best cream ever! Yes it is expensive but literally a little goes a long way and it is good for 24 months ... 2 years!!! That means if this is the only cream you are using every day ....It only costs $21.65 Canadian per month. Depending on your skin chose the right la mer cream for your skin type. If you are like me, dry, eczema prone with the occasional pimple here or there. Get the creme de la mer moisturizer. A good cleanser, this cream and a good active ( ie: retinol, lactic, vitamin c, salicylic ...etc) is all you will need. Think of all the money you spend at Sephora anyway!  Lol. This review is NOT sponsored I just love this cream! Note: the 0.5 oz/15ml lasted me well over a year.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich, nourishing cream moisturizer powered by potent actives, including vital lipids and nutripeptides that richly hydrate.
review_description: I received this product for free for testing purposes. I really enjoy this moisturizer and use it at night as it’s a thicker cream. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling soft.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An ultra-lightweight gel cream that infuses thirsty skin with three types of hyaluronic acid and ceramides for nonstop, visible plumping hydration.
review_description: Not dewy at all.  Sinks into the skin very quickly and is not sticky which is nice.  For winter, it might not be the best.  I have dry skin and an oily t-zone and it’s not providing enough hydration for me personally.  I think this would be a great summer moisturizer or great for really oily skin.  So far, not bad but not the best.  I prefer the PTR Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Cream or the Glow Recipe Watermelon Pink Juice Moisturizer over this one.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: I've been using this cream for a few days now. I do like it so far. Bought this because of the benefits. I use it as a night cream instead of my water cream (that I've used for years) for a boost of hydration and I wake up with beautiful dewy skin! It is a thicker cream compared to the water cream and my skin doesnt soak it in as fast leaving my skin feeling sticky. So I dont think it would be good under make up although I havent tried. But for my use it's been great without any breakouts or redness.  Same price as the water cream which is a plus.

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: Velvety touch, makes my skin soft and moist. It might not be enough for the winter, but I bought it in the summer and it works just fine. Skin has a dewy finish all day long.

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_title: YES! Made turning 40 not so bad!
review_description: So I turned 40 last winter and felt as if I was 140 : ( but enough of that pity party because im over it and pushing 41! I bought a bunch of The Ordinary products and have been using them religiously. I usually feel my skin feeling and looking better but I wasn’t necessary blown away. Then I got lazy (yah, I know) with my regimen and noticed a significant difference in the plumpness, feel and look of my skin. It didn’t look as refreshed or hydrated and I def saw my wrinkles being more pronounced. Needless to say, I jumped back on my regimen of these products and I’m feeling good again! I think some women may not find these products to work because they may not have advancing skin and they expect a miracle to erase their one blemished spot or wrinkle. But for me, with issues of fine lines and dullness, these products have hit the mark.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Even if I use 2 pumps, it will not be able to cover your whole face. It leaves this "tacky" feeling on your skin.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An anti-aging night serum that hydrates skin overnight for a smoother-looking complexion and a radiant glow come morning.
review_description: This stuff is amazing. To be honest I have no idea what it's actually supposed to do, all I know is that it makes my skin plump and silky smooth, and my breakouts look a million times better by the morning- I can't say it's solely this product as I just started using the whole Kiehl's line, but my acne has significantly improved. It has a soothing scent that is great for nighttime and it's just one of those products you look forward to putting on your face.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_description: Love! Love! Love! The scent is wonderful and reminds me of picking vegetables in my great-grandma’s garden. The formula is great! It is lightweight and my skin soaks it right up! I hope YTTP come out with more products in the future.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_title: Great for my sensitive skin with dry patches!
review_description: I have sensitive skin that was getting dry patches during the season changes - this helped a ton! Took down redness, helped with the dry patches, I felt like I couldn't overuse it, even though I was nervous because it had AHAs in it and usually those bother me. Really nice smell, sinks in well, great mask at night - but also emergency "fixes" early in the morning pre-makeup!

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: Best product for night time! Wouldn’t recommend any other product! Works so well! Wish I could rate it more than a 5!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_title: did not enjoy the smell but love everything else
review_description: I got to try this product for free and I thought the formula was nice and light. Seemed gentle but effective. I did not enjoy the smell but it seems like that’s what you get with natural products. I’m still using it but I’ve seen a pleasant change with my skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_title: Skin of a teenager all over again...
review_description: I got a deluxe sample of this with my last order. I was so excited to get this and see if it would fade my dark brown area on my forehead (due to pregnancies) Well, I have good news and bad news...good news is after two applications, the brown has slightly faded but the bad news is I developed acne like a teenager! I havent has so much acne since I was 15! Not just little pimples, the nasty under the skin ones...and my face because so oily! I have read other reviews with the regular strength and I am not the only one who has developed this problem. I rather live with the brown and cover it up than have acne again. Will not be using again.

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_description: This is a beautiful product that evens my skin tone and reduces the appearance of redness, all while providing sun protection and feel good skin ingredients. It's a perfect application for no makeup days, did not cause breakouts; however, it does settle into fine lines with a generous application. It is pricey, yet I got a full 6 months out of the large jar with daily use. Will definitely repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness

review_description: Absolutely love this. Works wonders on my dry and sensitive skin.

what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description: This is a gel cream dream. So smooth and hydrating and I love the delicate rose smell! I can't believe the price point of this for how luxurious it feels! Love!!!

what_it_is: A 15 percent vitamin C serum boosted with caffeine to visibly brighten, reduce hyperpigmentation, even tone, firm the look of skin, and depuff.

My skin has become very evenly toned and I can definitely tell a difference from when I was not using this serum. Will definitely be keeping it in my routine.

The only thing I would recommend is making the sheets half and then having more product within the packaging.  I feel that the full sheet is too large and I usually waste it.

No reaction and saw a brightening effect after a couple days.  There is a little bit of tackiness if you are using this alone but I can deal with it.  This toner is an absolute YES for me!

what_it_is: A natural daily exfoliator that buffs and polishes with BHA and apricot microspheres to reveal smooth, radiant healthy-looking skin.
review_title: BEST CLEANSER FOR SENSITIVE COMBINATION SKIN

I do put the cream on before dressing and make sure it has a bit of time to sink in before putting cloths on though.

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: Love this refill!  The case is perfect for it too and looks like a cute lipstick case.  I love the small mirror on it as well.  Highly recommend!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven texture
what_it_is: A mega-rich gel serum that visibly brightens, tightens, and lifts, while also providing all-day hydration and an instant glow.
review_description: I have combination skin that is very sensitive. I've been using this serum for a few days now and WOW. My skin feels so soft and balanced. All you need is one pump, a little goes a very long way. My skin looks very nice and glowing. I use this daily, day and night. I highly recommend this product, I am in love with it.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture, Acne and Blemishes

review_description: This setting spray makes you look dewy!!!! When I'm using a matte foundation I make sure I set my face with this so it doesn't dry my face. I also used it as primer and it hydrate your skin! I have really DRY skin and this has helped me apply my foundation beautifully

review_description: I first tried this item, in a sample. I can't get over how good this works for my skin. My skin feels softer, and helps with my acne.

I love Drunk Elephant, and I also have an issue with their prices. This guy is set at $42 dollars, and I saw almost no change in my skin except a slight increase in moisture. I noticed that my skin was itchy and fragile/tender when I used it, so in my opinion, the benefits of moisture were not worth the drawbacks. I used this item on my husband, whose skin REALLY needs love and he didn't have any sort of a reaction similar to mine.
For me: ⭐ ⭐
For him: ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ the reason I give it 5 stars for him is because it sinks in so fast, adds moisture, and is ZERO effort for him. I will say it doesn’t strip my skin like many other toners do- so it hasn’t had an adverse or negative effect.  Save your $100 for something that has more bang for your buck.

I really like using this twice a day am and pm after cleansing.
My only con would the texture which is very light that I do realize how much is too much, I do not feel the toner on the skin and end up using more than required. 
Overall very nice for for the purpose and can be used around the year as its not drying yet controls the shiny feel on the oily skin.

review_description: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! This is a stealing price. Usually Tatcha products are on the pricey side, but this one was so worth it. Next time I am going to stock up on it. I like the way it makes my skin feels soft and clean after a nice wash.

Found too rough to use on face as it made my skin to red after despite lightly applying onto skin. Probably better to use on body. do not use in hair**

I cannot tell you how much I love this product, and even though it is expensive it’s totally 100% worth it, I love it so so so much!!! ❤️❤️❤️

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

review_description: This sweet gentle face scrub is perfect for my sensitive dry skin. It didn’t irritate my skin or feel abrasive like physical scrubs can do. I received it free to try from Huda and Influenster. And I’m so happy I was able to try it because I’d buy it myself.

what_it_is: A silky gel crème cleanser that lifts daily dirt and makeup in one squeaky-clean wash, while also unclogging pores.

review_description: I was not expecting to be as impressed with this as I am. It’s a gel that turns into a thick and rich cream when emulsified & left my skin feeling so silky and hydrated, not at all stripped. My face felt so hydrated that I didn’t feel dry or tight whatsoever for a long time after using it. The ingredients are so unique and my skin drank it up. Very impressed.

what_it_is: A dual-action warming and cooling pore-refining facial scrub with glycolic and lactic acids to deeply purify pores, absorb excess oil, and leave skin soft, smooth, and healthy-looking.
review_description: I love this product! Feels good and cooling on the face. I'm combination skin and I haven't had any issues which is awesome. Highly recommend and is always part of my loves list.

skincare_concerns: Dryness

review_description: This face wash is so nice! It’s foamy without being sticky, and smooths without feeling heavy or chemically. I’ve already started noticing an improvement in my skin with decreases in general puffiness and brightening of dark spots and under-eye darkness. A light lemon and herb scent is an enjoyable way to start and end the day!

review_description: The wipes are not very moist in the package they came in. I do have to wet them a little with water. But they are great for those who have dry, sensitive skin. Will be buying more.

review_description: The only reason I gave it 4/5 stars and not a full 5 is because the scent is barely there. It's not too harsh and leaves skin smooth, doesn't leave residue behind.

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: The only unscented cleansing balm that works! This cleansing balm is so gentle and effective. It melts into the skin perfectly and washes off without leaving any residue.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_title: My skin feels truly pampered after using this!
review_description: I bought a mini-size of this makeup remover to try, as I didn't want to pay full-price for the large size without knowing whether or not I'd like it. Well, I love it! It IS a bit greasy, but I use a damp washcloth to get the product off and it works just fine. The greasiness is well worth it after getting all the product off, because it moisturizes my skin so well (I also love the subtle natural smell to it). I use the Protini moisturizer (also by DE) after using this and it leaves my skin SO moisturized! Highly recommend this for extremely dry skin (as long as you're willing to pay a bit more for it). I'll also say that I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and this product doesn't irritate it at all.

what_it_is: A dual-action exfoliator that smooths and polishes skin to reveal a natural glow; lactic acid and fruit enzymes clean clogged pores in as little as one use.
review_description: I bought this in NYC while waiting in the salon for a friend to have her eyebrows waxed. While walking out the door I thought, "Well, there I go blowing money because I'm bored!" While it was a little of that, I must say that I DO like the product and will probably keep it on hand. It does cause a burning sensation on my skin, even after several regular applications. I don't use it 2x a week, but instead keep it on hand for that oh so fabulous few days out of the month when my skin tries to break out, or when I feel like I just need a little something and don't want to go for a full facial. It does have immediate results, however you will want to give it a test run your first try. It leaves my face looking red (like a sun burn) for about 20-30 minutes after use. My only complaint is that I do think it's over priced for what it is. I would use it a lot more often if it didn't come with that price tag.

review_description: I love these sheets, and the packaging is very cute

skincare_concerns: Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A topical formula for breakouts with results as good as a leading prescription.
review_description:
Okay. So I've been dealing with a rather embarassing bout of adult acne that has given 14-year-old me's idea of acne a run for her money. For weeks I have tried a multitude of products, washes, exfoliants, creams, organic sulfate free soaps with oils of tea tree, peppermint, gypsy tears, and sweat of 4 month old virgin lambs from the eastern shores New Zealand (not actually, but some of the ingredients get rather absurd).

Yesterday, after a fruitful spree at Sephora, I opted for yet another product to mostly likely add to my countertop graveyard of failed attempts to reach clear skin again. I tried it last night, just a thin layer as the directions prompted, and rubbed it onto my cheeks. Put some lotion on after and went to bed. I wasn't expecting much to be honest!

When I woke up this morning, even before looking in a mirror, I happened to touch my cheek. I immediately sprung out of bed and ran to the bathroom to see if what I felt was real or if I was dreaming. After just one use, my cheeks had not a spot of acne on them! Still a bit of redness from where some of the bad spots had been, but everything is smooth and soft and there's no bumps or speckles to be found! I'm actually so impressed, that I couldn't continue my day without sharing this small victory!

At about $33 for this teeny sized bottle, I'm not going to say this is cheap, but I only had to use so little so far and I'm going to go right ahead and say it was worth it. Unfortunately I don't have the guts to share a before and after photo, but I am going to keep using Clinique and hopefully the positive results continue! I've only ever heard good things about their skincare and I'm glad I finally tried it!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

review_description: AMAZING. My skin texture has changed in the best way possible. I noticed a change after just 2 days of use. My scars are fading, pores are shrinking and dry patches are gone. I'm not sure which ingredient in this is doing the trick or if its just the combo of everything, but it has everything that my skin needed in one container. OBSESSED and I recommend to everyone to give this a try!! WORTH THE INVESTMENT!

review_description: Leaves your sling glowing before bed. It smells absolutely gorgeous, clicks really well with oily skin, and doesn’t stain pillows.

what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description:
I received this product complimentary from influenster in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is stunning, I was blown away when I opened the box. The cream is strongly floral scented, which can be really bad for people with sensitive skin, especially those sensitive to fragrances. I have extremely dry, moderately sensitive skin, but don’t usually have trouble with fragrance in products. 
This cream is incredibly thick and doesn’t spread very easily, which means it applies quite thick on the skin. For my super dry skin, this thick layer was perfect for me. I used this and the J Lo Glow serum for a week, replacing all other serums, moisturizer and oils that I typically use every night. The first night I wasn’t sure, my skin felt like it could still use more moisture, but the next day I woke up and my face was truly GLOWING. Every night since, my skin feels hydrated, and it looks dewy all day.

review_description:
This oil has helped with the texture of my skin for sure! I love the blue tint, allowing you to know when it is fully rubbed in. The smell doesn't bother me. I just think of it as a natural product with good ingredients. The price is steep, no joke. Sunday Riley is an investment.

review_description: You will really see the difference after a few uses. Masks have been making me breakout around my chin and this has definitely helped. review_description: I’m a big believer of retinol and having this product as an added boost of it to my daily DDG retinol moisturizer has been amazing!

review_description: I bought this today after reading Sir John's recommendations for great skin (his two biggest recommendations were rose oil and a good glycol facial/mask) and came home ready to use it. I have dry flaky skin around my cheeks, and eyebrow areas fyi. I first washed my face with Tatcha deep cleanser and toned using a seaweed cleansing toner from Mario Badescu. I followed with this facial. The directions tell you it will tingle, but it's more of a burn/tingle however it only lasted for about 15 seconds when I initially applied it. The directions also tell you to leave it for 3-10 minutes. I set a timer for 6 and it was perfect because that's when it started tingling again (less of a sting this time). I washed it off, and man the difference in my skin. It was very soft, the dry flaky areas were immediately gone and my pores were noticeably (to me) smaller. The only thing I could say negative, but not really was that it left me with some redness, but I followed with the rose

what_it_is: A daily peel in pre-soaked pads that contains three gentle acids, anti-agers, and soothing botanicals to exfoliate and nourish sensitive skin and combat the three most common signs of aging.
review_title: Game-changer! No more acne, faded scars
review_description: I don't normally post reviews but this has been a game-changer for me. I've struggled with adult acne for years and have sensitive skin. Have never used peels before and was VERY skeptical to try this, worried it would cause me to break out or worsen existing pimples. After reading all the great reviews decided to buy the 14 day set. Have been using it every other day after washing my face at night and it has drastically improved my complexion. I'm in love with this product! It's faded a lot of my acne scars and has evened out my skin texture (which was incredibly rough from cystic acne scars). It also stops new pimples from fully forming. I haven't been acne-free in years and now I am! Yay! If I could give this 10 stars I would. Just bought the 30 day treatment. Expensive yes, but seriously worth every penny.

what_it_is: A daily treatment pad with lactic and glycolic acids to safely and effectively exfoliate, tone, and brighten.
review_description: Out of all the stuff I get from Sephora, this is the first time I've ever taken the time to review a product - because I feel that this one deserves it. I have sensitive skin, and these pads did not irritate at all. I was so scared after my first application thinking what my face would look like in the morning. (Redness, hives, etc. like from other new products.) To my surprise, it was soft, smooth, clear, and looked better than it did the day before. I've only been using them for a few days - at night only and before moisturizer - and my face looks so much smoother and clearer I can't believe it. I think they might even be gentle enough to use morning and night - I will try this after a week or so. Definitely recommend this for gentle renewal of sensitive skin.

what_it_is: A powerful, three-in-one solution packed with 16 percent AHAs and niacinamide to exfoliate and visibly brighten skin while reducing the appearance of pores.
review_description:
I wanted to try this because I really loved Summer Friday's Masks and Vitamin C Serum. After using it for about 3 months every other day I can say I can't live without it. I've had this reoccurring clogged pore / pimple on my forehead for years and couldn't figure out a solution for it. After using this for about a month, the clogged pore disappeared and hasn't reappeared since. 

I do warn you that the smell is not nice. It does smell like chemicals, but it doesn't linger after applied.
